I'd like to be able to see all 6 direction indicators on the navball.

So that means all of these:

Which comes down to adding normal/antinormal and radial in/out.

I also suggest a retrograde maneuver node marker.

Of course new players should not be overloaded with all this information, so this would be called "expert mode" and enabled through options.

Edited October 25, 2013 by Psycix
I'd like these on navball too. They even intended to put them there but in the end there wasn't time to do that. There's a mod doing exactly that, by the way.

That would be the Enhanced Navball for anyone who's looking for it. It makes things much easier to work with. While they're adding stock indicators, something like the Navball Docking Alignment Indicator would be useful too.

Thanks, that mod's functionality is exactly what I was looking for!

I change the suggestion to: "Make this available as an option in stock."
